Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to allowing inmates access to confidential phone calls
Summary: Allows inmates to make confidential phone calls to legal services providers or attorneys within the state at no charge to the inmate or the attorney.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to inmate access to confidential phone calls
